## ILogEvent interface

Describes all necessary information about a log event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface ILogEvent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [layer](./jabra-js.ilogevent.layer.md) |  | [StackLayer](./jabra-js.stacklayer.md) | The stack layer where the log event occurred, e.g. inside the Chrome extension. See [StackLayer](./jabra-js.stacklayer.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [level](./jabra-js.ilogevent.level.md) |  | [LogLevel](./jabra-js.loglevel.md) | The severity of the log event, e.g. error or warning. See [LogLevel](./jabra-js.loglevel.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [message](./jabra-js.ilogevent.message.md) |  | string | Text message that will be logged. |
